page.title: 09CHILDHOOD ACTIVITIES
page.content: Every child between 5 & 16 years old must go to school. At weekends and holidays I (a boy aged 11) go shooting, make racing carties or underground huts, muck about in cars & 6 motor -bikes, see if there's any stock car for sale and practice stunts on my BMX bike. I buy old bikes, do them up and sell them. I play with my horses Sooty & Pepper and my Mum's horse & foal. Girl's activities include watching T.V., reading books, comics, annuals, cycling, playing on swings or playing an instrument. In days gone by children played adventure games outside when they could or read books and make things inside. Girls played with dolls and boys collected toy cars etc. Children used to work on the farms a lot.
